explains: n. 概念，观念；想出，构想；受孕，怀孕；创始
wordGroup: immaculate conception [宗]无沾成胎说；圣灵感孕说
conception rate 受胎率；受孕率

sentences.en: My conception of a garden was based on gardens I had visited in England.
sentences.cn: 我对花园的概念是基于我在英格兰参观过的一些花园的。

sentences.en: The plan was brilliant in its conception but failed because of lack of money.
sentences.cn: 尽管这计划构想绝妙，但终因资金不足而告流产。

sentences.en: However, this entire conception is scientifically inaccurate.
sentences.cn: 然而，这整个概念在科学上是不准确的。
